title: GenderSpeak - Personal Effectiveness in Gender Communication 5th
description:
Title: GenderSpeak: Personal Effectiveness in Gender Communication 
Author: Diana K. Ivy 
Format: PDF 
Paperback: 304 pages 
Publisher: Pearson; 5th edition (Sep 15, 2011) 
Language: English 
ISBN-10: 0205825478

Updated in a new 5th edition, GenderSpeak examines attitudes, gender identities, and stereotypes that characterize communication in relationships. Focused on communication about as well as between men and women, this practical and readable text connects material to the readerâ€™s everyday life. GenderSpeak provides a balanced approach to the study of gender communication, presenting current research and a variety of perspectives and sources, while minimizing slant or bias.

INCLUDES ALL PAGES INCLUDING REFERENCE PAGES AND 2 CHAPTER PAGES PREVIOUSLY MISSING
